Articles.Content:
Hello again! So, i'm using the OPP mod in which there is planète with ring.

My goal for this career is to kolonize Sarnus.

Wondering how therings were actually implemented. Are they à solid object or can i go through them? Do i have to consider them at all in my mission planning?

As ever,thanks for your help!

21 minutes ago, Madscientist16180 said:

Hello again! So, i'm using the OPP mod in which there is planète with ring.

My goal for this career is to kolonize Sarnus.

Wondering how therings were actually implemented. Are they à solid object or can i go through them? Do i have to consider them at all in my mission planning?

As ever,thanks for your help!

Outer Planets Mod's iconic ringed planets Sarnus and Urlum, huh? Well, the rings were implemented by a small code added to their Kopernicus script files (the configs read by Kopernicus that contain all the info about the planets that Kopernicus needs). They are made with a small and simple texture, but you cannot collide with them. So don't worry about passing through them.
